ModMetaData.name: Electromagic Weaponry - Railgun
ModMetaData.author: Negitive
ModMetaData.description: A Simple mod that currently adds a single weapon, a Railgun. The Railgun features devastating power over long range by accelerating projectiles to hypersonic velocities using magnets. However, this power comes with the drawback of poor accuracy at close ranges and it's most powerful shots destroying it's capacitors, requiring replacement after each overloaded shot.
